communications.name: Producer
communications.action: Active player takes 1 random card from the deck and 1 card from target (target's choice). The active player may secretly change any cards with their own, and then return 1 card to the deck and 1 card to the target player.
communications.counteraction: Target may claim Producer to avoid giving (and then receiving) one of their cards.

communications.name: Director
communications.action: Active player takes 2 random cards from the Deck. They may Secretly Change any cards with their own, and then return 2 cards to the Deck.

force.name: Crime Boss
force.action: Active player declares a Target. Target can choose to give the active player (2-isk) and the turn ends. If not, the active player must pay (5-isk) to the Treasury and the Target loses a life. The active player must have (5-isk) to take this action.

finance.name: Spy
finance.action:
Active player takes (1-isk) from the Treasury and can then take an additional action of their choice. They cannot take the intel action again this turn.
If a player starts a  turn with 10 or more coins(isk), they must take the Coup action and may not claim spy before doing so. If a player takes the intel action and then has10 coins(isk) - they must take the Coup action as their additional action.

specialInterest.name: Priest
specialInterest.action: When active player claims Priest, all other players become Targets and have to give (1-isk) to the active player.
specialInterest.counteraction: Target may claim Priest to avoid giving (1-isk) to the active player.

specialInterest.name: Foreign Consular
specialInterest.action: Active player takes both Treaty tokens, placing one in front of themselves and one in front of another player. Players with Treaty tokens may not Target each other unless they are the final two players. This includes Coup actions but does not preclude challenges.
